title: Triumph of Steam and Electricity Image MCQ 3

content.question: Which of the following contributed directly to Great Britainâ€™s ability to consolidate or expand its colonial control of interior regions of Asia and Africa in the late nineteenth century?

choices.label: The changes illustrated in the middle row of the image only
The changes illustrated in the bottom row of the image only
The changes illustrated in the top two rows of the image
The changes illustrated in the bottom two rows of the image

content.answer: The changes illustrated in the top two rows of the image
